author: Emmanuel Otero
description: Emmanuel Otero says of his drink, “1300 millas is the distance between New York and La Habana and represents the distance between the cocktail epicentre and Cuba, the Bacardi homeland.”
name: 1300 Millas

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
Special ingredient #1: Pineapple & clove syrup (1 litre hot water / 1 kg sugar / 5-6 smashed cloves / peeled pineapple in cubes)
